title: Romans (group)
text:
Romans (ろまんす, pronounced romance) was a short-lived female Japanese pop unit formed in 2003, consisting of five singers also active in other pop bands from Hello! Project. The group only released one single, "Sexy Night: Wasurerarenai Kare", on August 20, 2003, ranking N°10 on Oricon charts, and disbanded the same year.


== Members ==
Mari Yaguchi (from bands Morning Musume, Tanpopo, Minimoni)
Rika Ishikawa (from bands Morning Musume, Tanpopo, and later V-u-den and Ongaku Gatas)
Mai Satoda (from band Country Musume, and later Ongaku Gatas)
Hitomi Saito (from band Melon Kinenbi)
Ayaka Kimura (from band Coconuts Musume)
